DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness Pipeline™ device treatment unruptured , wide-neck intracranial aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Embolization Intracranial Aneurysms With Pipeline™ Embolization Device
DOC.criteria: Subject provide write informed consent use IRB/ECapproved consent form agree comply protocol requirement . Age 2280 year . Subject target intracranial aneurysm ( IA ) locate anterior posterior circulation . Subject target IA wide aneurysm neck . Subject receive intracranial implant ( e.g . coil ) area target IA within past 12 week . Major surgery last 30 day . History irreversible bleed disorder and/or subject present sign active bleeding . Any known contraindication treatment Pipeline™ device . Pregnant woman . Participating another clinical trial .
